How many words (5+ letters) found in a 40x10 grid of...

...random letter selection?
418 611 481 956 663 479 563 510 524 511 640 641 369 705 643 552 615 902 409 481
560 446 614 359 634 474 550 681 643 740
> x <- read.csv('/tmp/statstmpfile', header = F); summary(x); sd(x[ , 1])
       V1       
 Min.   :359.0  
 1st Qu.:481.0  
 Median :561.5  
 Mean   :579.1  
 3rd Qu.:642.5  
 Max.   :956.0  
[1] 137.4499

...letters distributed by letter frequency in English language?
2941 3916 2984 2853 3328 3183 2694 3028 4014 3300 2936
> x <- read.csv('/tmp/statstmpfile', header = F); summary(x); sd(x[ , 1])
       V1      
 Min.   :2694  
 1st Qu.:2938  
 Median :3028  
 Mean   :3198  
 3rd Qu.:3314  
 Max.   :4014  
[1] 423.2421


...from horizontal lines built from a Markov model of the top 1000 most frequent English words?
3215 3875 3608 3913 4420 4426 5000 4174 3480 4038 3820

 Median :3913  
 Mean   :3997
